resources.string: Enable backlight with timeout only on button touch

Use the device hardware keys for navigation
Swap the order of recents and back buttons
Double tap on lockscreen to sleep
Double tap on the top third or bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to put the device to sleep

Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep

SystemUI will be restarted so that selected setting can be applied correctly.

Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy

Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Show heads up only for dialer app and disable all others
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed

Block all headsup notifications except calls

Double tap power to toggle torch
Long press power to toggle torch
To choose a specific app activity for the action, long press on any app in the apps picker.\n\nIf launcher is showing, do the swipe at the very bottom area of the screen to trigger the action.
Select an app to launch with the back gesture
Trigger action on wider swipe (more than half of display size), or a L swipe (vertically longer enough)
Display media cover art when playing music
Drag selection on the area you want to take as a screenshot
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.

Full → empty: red → green → blue → red

Set max repeat count. 0 for infinite
